Room.Name: Over Lake Kista Shores
Room.ShortDescription: The deep blue lake nestles in the Kista forest. 40.n0.e25.s8.w0
Room.LongDescription: You are near the western shore of the lake, where you can see a pier and several boats. The pines, cedar and oaks come almost to the water's edge. The pier seems to have some activity, and a small number of cabins are near its end. South is a dark storm.
